artist: Artist: Edward Ruscha; Publisher: Octopus Foundation, for Sonsbeek 71, Deventer, Netherlands
catalogue_raissonne: Foster 15; Engberg B14; The Open Book, pp.198-99
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Library Fund
description: Oblong folio with 116 photographic illustrations; coated white cardboard cover; tape and glue binding. 23 pp.; each leaf of illustration unfolds to double width. The photographs were taken only at bridge locations used as a walkway by the artist. This copy: First and only edition.
title: Dutch Details
